desc.en: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.jp: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.thai: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.ko: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第86首曲子，其在与“霍德”(Hod)战斗时使用。在编程中，“未定义行为”是指执行某种计算机代码所产生的结果，这种代码在当前程序状态下的行为在其所使用的语言标准中没有规定。
desc.zh_tw: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.thai: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.ko: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
